C01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: The Lost Realms are mysterious in nature, with doors all over the place. With so many doors to choose from, the freedom can almost feel stifling at times.

C01_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_DETAIL.text: Macha's magic is showing the way to a single door.

C01_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_WAVE_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_WAVE_100_DETAIL.text: Looks like there are four cats that got away to other worlds. Better get to it!

C01_SCAN_AMYA_2nd_WAVE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_SCAN_AMYA_2nd_WAVE_000_DETAIL.text: There are two cats that escaped to other worlds that need to be tracked down. Which should you go for first?

C01_SCAN_AMYA_2nd_WAVE_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_SCAN_AMYA_2nd_WAVE_100_DETAIL.text: You'll need to come back to the Lost Realms two more times. LoLo's not going to be happy about that.

C01_SCAN_AMYA_3rd_WAVE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_SCAN_AMYA_3rd_WAVE_000_DETAIL.text: Why aren't there fewer doors now? You did catch a cat, didn't you? How odd.

C01_SCAN_AMYA_3rd_WAVE_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_SCAN_AMYA_3rd_WAVE_100_DETAIL.text: Seeing the doors disappear one by one really makes you feel a sense of progress.

C01_SCAN_AMYA_4th_WAVE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_SCAN_AMYA_4th_WAVE_000_DETAIL.text: This is all the fault of that strange armored man. He sure has made life difficult for you.

C01_SCAN_AMYA_4th_WAVE_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_SCAN_AMYA_4th_WAVE_100_DETAIL.text: There's just one cat left to be found in another world. Don't give up until the job is done.

C01_WRLD_AMYA_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_AMYA_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: It's finally time to open the door to Pulchra.

C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_AMYA_FINAL_000_DETAIL.text: You can never go home to Pulchra again... Where should you go?

C01_SCAN_AMYA_FINAL_WAVE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_SCAN_AMYA_FINAL_WAVE_000_DETAIL.text: Macha's magic is showing the way to a single door. Believe in what the future holds and press on!

C01_DOOR_AMYA_BATTLE_VH_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_AMYA_BATTLE_VH_000_DETAIL.text: A truly grueling battle awaits beyond this door.

C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_DETAIL.text: The man who tried to steal your magic in Miyako City waits in front of the door!

C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_EVNT_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_DETAIL.text: The man who tried to steal your magic in Miyako City waits in front of the door!

C01_DOOR_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_DETAIL.text: Macha's magic points to one of the doors.

C01_DOOR_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_DETAIL.text: Macha's magic points to one of the doors.

C01_DOOR_AMYA_W03_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_AMYA_W03_000_DETAIL.text: You can sense that a world of darkness lies just beyond the door.

C01_DOOR_AMYA_W04_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_AMYA_W04_000_DETAIL.text: You can sense that an oceanic world lies just beyond the door.

C01_DOOR_AMYA_W06_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_AMYA_W06_000_DETAIL.text: You can sense that...some world of other lies just beyond the door.

C01_DOOR_AMYA_W07_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_AMYA_W07_000_DETAIL.text: You can sense that a world full of spiritual energy lies just beyond the door.

C01_DOOR_AMYA_W08_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_AMYA_W08_000_DETAIL.text: You can sense that a hole lies just beyond the door. ...Wait, a hole?

C01_DOOR_AMYA_W09_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_AMYA_W09_000_DETAIL.text: You can sense that some infernal ride lies just beyond the door.

C01_DOOR_AMYA_W10_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_AMYA_W10_000_DETAIL.text: You can sense that a completely incomprehensible world lies just beyond the door.

C01_DOOR_AMYA_W11_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_AMYA_W11_000_DETAIL.text: You can sense that beautiful flowers lie just beyond the door.

C01_DOOR_AMYA_W12_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_AMYA_W12_000_DETAIL.text: You can sense that an immensely frigid world lies just beyond the door. Brrr!

C01_DOOR_AMYA_W13_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_AMYA_W13_000_DETAIL.text: You can sense that an impossibly dry world lies just beyond the door. Unfortunate for your skin regime.

C01_DOOR_AMYA_W14_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_AMYA_W14_000_DETAIL.text: You can sense that a world of infinite possibilities lies just beyond the door. May no one be peeping on you!

C01_DOOR_AMYA_W15_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_AMYA_W15_000_DETAIL.text: You can sense the presense of myriad triangles just beyond the door.

C01_DOOR_AMYA_W17_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_AMYA_W17_000_DETAIL.text: You can sense an endless struggle just beyond the door.

C01_DOOR_AMYA_W18_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_AMYA_W18_000_DETAIL.text: You can sense a total lack of magical energy just beyond the door.

C01_DOOR_AMYA_W19_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_AMYA_W19_000_DETAIL.text: You can sense a bevy of bugs and snakes just beyond the door.
